Quick intro!

Words are identified by language

```{julia}
#| warning: false
#| output: false
using OpenScripturesHebrew
words = tanakh()
length(words)
```


```{julia}
#| warning: false
#| output: false
hwords = filter(w -> ishebrew(w), words)
length(hwords)
```
